commands.name: permit

options.name: enable
options.description: Enable a command in your server.

commands.name: gatekeeper
commands.description: Command to setup verification system in your server.

options.name: config
options.description: Configure verification system in your server like status, action, duration etc.

options.name: status
options.description: Enable or disable verification system in your server.

options.name: action
options.description: Change the action bot takes once the user failed in verification.

options.name: duration
options.description: For how long do you want the verification process to last? e.g. 2h, 1 hour and 30 min

options.name: verified_role
options.description: Bot will add this role when a member complete verification process.

options.name: log_channel
options.description: Channel where bot will log all the verification process.

options.name: show
options.description: Show current configuration of your server.

options.name: setup
options.description: Setup gatekeeper in your server.

commands.name: giveaway
commands.description: Create, edite, reroll giveaway by using this command.

options.name: start
options.description: Start giveaway in your server!

options.name: channel
options.description: Channel where you want to start giveaway

options.name: prize
options.description: Prize the winner will get in this giveaway.

options.name: duration
options.description: How long this giveaway will run?

options.name: winners
options.description: No. of winners

options.name: role_requirement
options.description: Role require to participate in this giveaway.

options.name: message_requirement
options.description: No. of messages required to participate in a giveaway.

options.name: server_requirement
options.description: Server member must join to participate in this giveaway.

options.name: end
options.description: End an ongoing giveaway in your server.

options.name: giveaway_id
options.description: Giveaway ID of the giveaway you want to end.

options.name: reroll
options.description: Reroll giveaway in your server.

options.name: giveaway_id
options.description: Giveaway ID of the giveaway you want to reroll.

options.name: edit
options.description: Edit a giveaway in your server

options.name: giveaway_id
options.description: Giveaway ID of the giveaway you want to edit.

options.name: duration
options.description: New duration

options.name: winners
options.description: New winner count.

options.name: prize
options.description: New prize.

options.name: delete
options.description: Delete a giveaway from your server.

options.name: giveaway_id
options.description: Giveaway ID of the giveaway you want to delete.

options.name: pause
options.description: Pause a giveaway in your server

options.name: giveaway_id
options.description: Giveaway ID of the giveaway you want to pause.

options.name: unpause
options.description: Unpause a giveawa in your server.

options.name: giveaway_id
options.description: Giveaway ID of the giveaway you want to unpause.

options.name: list
options.description: List giveaways active in this server.

options.name: setting
options.description: Configure giveaway settings for your server

options.name: set
options.description: Set giveaway data in your server.

options.name: giveaway_channel
options.description: Channel where all giveaways will be posted if no channel mentioned in command.

options.name: winner_count
options.description: No. of winner(s) in a giveaway, if no winnerCount is provided.

options.name: participation_role
options.description: Role required to participate in all giveaways.

options.name: host
options.description: Role required to create a giveaway

options.name: reset
options.description: Reset all the current giveaway data of your server.

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove a giveaway data from your server

options.name: data
options.description: Giveaway data.

options.name: show
options.description: Show current giveaway settings.

developerCommands.name: developer
developerCommands.description: Commands which can only be used by bot developers.

options.name: eval
options.description: Evaluate code using commands.

options.name: code
options.description: Write your code you want the system to run!
